question: Which are the countries that are native to "Macushi people"?
explanation: Guyana, Brazil, and Venezuela are the countries that are native to "Macushi people". The Macushi are an indigenous people living in the borderlands of southern Guyana, northern Brazil in the state of Roraima, and in an eastern part of Venezuela. Macushi oral history describes them as descendants of the sun's children, who created fire, as well as diseases, and they also believe they discovered Washaca, the Tree of Life. The Macushi believe in the life principle and they believe it comes from the sun.
